title: Uzak Şehrin Masalı
overview: Umay, who is distrust after learning her husband Affan has a child with another woman, leaves their mansion with their two children and takes shelter with her older sister Sonay. Meanwhile, Kürşat, who entered the border illegally, hides in Sonay's house to evade the gendarme after him. To hide his true identity, Umay, Sonay, and Kürşat, whose paths cross, claim that Kürşat is Sonay's missing husband. Things start to get complicated when both Umay and Sonay begin to fall in love with Kürşat...
